import SearchBar from "./SearchBar"; import { useState } from "react"; import Check from "./Check"; function UnderCar_section({ title, options }) { const [checks, setChecks] = useState([]); const [note, setNote] = useState(""); const [radio1_1, setRadiu1_1] = useState(""); const [radio1_2, setRadiu1_2] = useState(""); const [radio1_3, setRadiu1_3] = useState(""); const [radio2_1, setRadiu2_1] = useState(""); const [radio2_2, setRadiu2_2] = useState(""); const [radio2_3, setRadiu2_3] = useState(""); const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const handleCheck = ({ target }) => { setChecks([...checks, target.value]); }; return (

{title}

{/* تشيك بوكس سحّاب خاص بنظام القير والديفرنس ونظام المكينة */} {title === "نظام القير والدفرنس" ? ( <>

) : ( <> )} {options .filter((i) => { return new RegExp(search, "ig").test(i.title); }) .map((i) => { return ( ); })}
